nova-white.name: Nova White
nova-white.description:
Why This Rope?

Freestyle. Progress Faster.

Built for pure freestyle flow and rapid skill learning, it's 50% smoother and more responsive than silicone or wire ropes. Learning new skills feels natural and effortless with this rope. It's the only rope you'll need for freestyle, whether you're just starting or leveling up.

With just 5mm of speed-weighted PVC and a nylon core, you're getting power, precision, and a full-body burn in every session.

Specs

  • 3.3 meters adjustable 5mm PVC cord with string core
  • Easy length adjustment method, fits up to 6'4" Height
  • Unbreakable handles with a string core in the PVC for durability
  • Compatible for kids

SIZE GUIDE

All of our ropes are 3.3 meters long and are length adjustable. To size your rope follow these steps.

  1. Step on the middle of the rope.
  2. Pull both of the handles pointing upwards.
  3. The end of both handles should reach anywhere between lower chest and middle chest.

aether.name: Aether
aether.description:
Why This Rope?

Built for pure freestyle flow and rapid skill learning, it's 50% smoother and more responsive than silicone or wire ropes. Learning new skills feels natural and effortless with this rope. It's the only rope you'll need for freestyle, whether you're just starting or leveling up.

With just 5mm of speed-weighted PVC and a nylon core, you're getting power, precision, and a full-body burn in every session.

Specs

  • 10ft adjustable 5mm PVC cord with string core
  • Easy length adjustment method, fits up to 6'4" Height
  • Unbreakable handles with a string core in the PVC for durability
  • Compatible for kids

SIZE GUIDE

All of our ropes are 3.3 meters long and are length adjustable. To size your rope follow these steps.

  1. Step on the middle of the rope.
  2. Pull both of the handles pointing upwards.
  3. The end of both handles should reach anywhere between lower chest and middle chest.

combo-package.name: Combo Package
combo-package.description: Get both the Full White and Dotted ropes in one package. Perfect for variety in your training routine, this combo gives you everything you need to progress from beginner to advanced levels. Switch between styles based on your workout intensity and goals.
